Asteroid designations ( Number, Name, Temporary designation): 2203, van Rhijn,  1935 SQ1, 1951 PP, 1957 UX, 1974 XQ
Observation was done on (UT) (format YYYY-MM-DD-hh): 2012 - 12 - 17 - 21:32
Observation was made by : Fornasier Sonia E-mail; sonia.fornasier@obspm.fr
At observatory with UAI code: 950
Obsv. comments: uploaded by Simon Anghel
The spectrum was published in the article: http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2016Icar..269....1F
The normalization of this spectrum was made for the wavelength: 1.250 microns.
Original name of the file was: 2203 van Rhijn
